channel.title: FM-French Revoultion (6 Alive)
channel.description:
# The French Revoultion **Liberté, égalité, fraternité!**
# [U]RoleLlst[/U]
[details="Rolelist"] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Robespierre[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Jacobin Member[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Jacobin Member[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Jacobin Member[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Jacobin Member[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Jacobin Member[/COLOR] [COLOR="#0000FF"]King Louis XVI [/COLOR] [COLOR="#0000FF"]Monarchist[/COLOR] [COLOR="#0000FF"]Monarchist[/COLOR] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Assembly Member[/COLOR] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Assembly Member[/COLOR] [COLOR="#4B0082"]Napoleon Bonaparte [/COLOR] [/details]
[COLOR="#FF0000"]Robespierre and Jacobin Members[/COLOR]-See King Louis and the Monarchists Lynched [COLOR="#0000FF"]King Louis and Monarchist[/COLOR]-See Robespierre and The Jacobins elminiated [COLOR="#00FF00"]Assembly Member[/COLOR]-Choose a side or stay alive until the end [COLOR="#4B0082"]Napoloen Bonaparte[/COLOR]-See King Louis and Robespierre Dead
[details=Rolecards] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Robespierre[/COLOR] You can reveal for an extra vote You will not be informed if assembly member joins your side [COLOR="#FF0000"]Jacobin Member[/COLOR] Normal Citizen . [COLOR="#0000FF"]King Louis XVI [/COLOR] You know who your fellow monarchists are. You share a night chat with them. You control who the Monarchists kill [COLOR="#0000FF"]Monarchist[/COLOR] Normal Goon.. You share a night chat with your fellow Monarchists and King Louis. You can kill at the orders of The King [COLOR="#00FF00"]Assembly Member[/COLOR] You may choose a side at any point the game or stay neutral and survive [COLOR="#4B0082"]Napoloen Bonaparte[/COLOR] You can kill one person three times. You are night immune [/details]
# Order of Operations 1.Napoleon attacks 2.Louis Shoots 3.Monarchists Shoot
# Mechanics Lynch is mandatory, who ever has majorty EOD is lynched and if there is a tie it is RNGd Day is 48 hours Night is 24 hours # Rules of Conduct No excessive swearing Don't gamethrow Don't communcaite out of game Please post 5 times an in game day, the Revolution needs you! No limits on pictures or links, just keep it PG-13
# Signs 1. Sam 2. Marl 3. NightX 4. The Ultimate Gambler 5. MaximusPrime 6. MTheJoker 7. Hippo 8. PKR 9. Wolfy 10. FireKitten 11. Bos 12. Pugerino

item.title: FM-French Revoultion (6 Alive)
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
oh god I’ve been putting the write-up for this game off for a while but here we go

Town Players

you guys were idiots, turbo lynching not even 5ish hour into the day. The only reason you guys won was due to Hippo killing sam N1
the cycles were short leading to a near scum roll over
also I think most of the people here are used to trials and not having that safety net got them bad
Lesson:DON’T TURBO LYNCH

Assembly Members

I thought you would pick a side fairly quickly, but you all stayed nuet until the end. NIce job

Napoleon

You played very well, that win was well deserved

Monarchists

Going in I expected you to lose when I saw the scum team I turned out to be right but not for the reason I thought. You all played extremely well

In Summary:Take your time and think your lynches out

Read full topic
